title: Haas keeps rejecting offers for the F1 team - What you missed at the British GP
summary: From a Sauber fairytale to a Lego trophy, political tremors to paddock surprises, the 2025 British Grand Prix weekend delivered drama, emotion and headlines on and off the track that few saw coming

qa_pairs.question: Which team is known for its fairytale story in Formula 1, particularly highlighted during the British Grand Prix weekend?
What type of trophy was notably mentioned in relation to the British Grand Prix?
What kind of events besides racing typically occur during a Grand Prix weekend that can affect team dynamics?
